Periwinkle Park Update
Periwinkle Park Campground on Sanibel Island Now Accepting Camping Reservations for Summer and Fall 2025.
Periwinkle Park Campground, located on the Sanibel Island, is pleased to announce the availability of camping reservations for summer and fall 2024. The campground offers a unique outdoor experience for campers looking to explore the beauty of Sanibel Island.
Periwinkle Park Is Open to Campers!
For reservations and office related inquiries, please call 239-472-1433.
Lots for sale
Thank you for visiting Periwinkle Park
A destination park on beautiful Sanibel Island. We offer accommodations for campers from motorhomes to tents and everything in between. Just a 10 minute walk to white, sandy shell-lined beaches (we’re only half a mile away!)
Accommodations
Attractions
Rates
Grounds Map
Park Rules
Location & Navigation
We are located at 1119 Periwinkle Way, a half mile to the Gulf Beaches!
From I-75:
Exit 131. Go west on Daniels Parkway to Six Mile Cypress, turn left. Follow to Summerlin Road, turn left. Follow to Sanibel.
From US 41:
Turn west onto Gladiolus Drive, follow to Summerlin Road, turn left. Follow to Sanibel
Showers
Laundry
Eating Areas
Florida Wildlife
Accommodations
Complete Hookups
Picnic Tables
Restrooms & Showers
Laundry
Ice
LP Gas
Pavilion available for private & public functions
Beach, Golf, Shops & Dining all within walking distance
No dogs allowed. No credit cards. Wi-fi is not provided.
Please note Campfires are not permitted.
If you need Wi-Fi during your stay, you must supply your own hotspot. Verizon has the best coverage in our area.
Reserve
We stayed in our Winnebago travel trailer at Periwinkle park for 10 days in May of 2019. Our stay was very positive and would recommend staying here. The campground was kept clean and the staff was friendly. The beach is a long walk away so I would recommend bringing or renting bikes. Great place to stay
TripAdvisor
Very nice campgrounds. Easy access to the beach and shops. Bring your bikes. Nice bike paths throughout the island. Would definitely camp there again.
TripAdvisor
We had a great stay at Periwinkle with our small pull behind camper. The location is great 10 min walk to the Beach or a quick bike ride. The camp ground is very well maintained and the facilities are super clean.
Vicky Z.
This place is AMAZING. So peaceful and quiet, staff is so friendly and helpful. Family owned since the 1970's...take the time to meet the owner, Dave, he's a friendly guy, willing to go above and beyond to make your stay pleasant.
K Gibson.
Periwinkle Park you exceeded all our expectations. The close proximity of the beach makes it easily accessible, The kids were able to enjoy along the morning rides to the beach everyday, to see the most magical Sunrises.
Shahana D.
This is our favorite place to camp! We love the beaches and how you can access everything from bicycle! We bring our two Littles with us and they love the bike riding to get ice cream!
Kristi S.
Such a lovely place! Enjoyed every second of our time there. Nice people, beautiful spot, great price! Won't disappoint! It was truly an amazing experience.
Morgan T.
Love this beautiful, peaceful, campground! Short bike ride to any store or restaurant! Full hookup sites. The restrooms/showers on property are taken care of & never runs out of hot water! Great family place!
Jayden S.
Attractions
www.Sanibel-Captiva.org - The Sanibel & Captiva Island Chamber of Commerce
www.SanibelMarina.com - Fishing charters, boat docking and more at The Sanibel Marina
www.DingDarlingSociety.org - a non-profit cooperating association dedicated to preserving the wildlife and habitat in the J.N. Ding Darling National Wildlife Refuge on Sanibel Island
www.ShellMuseum.org - promoting education and research on shells and mollusks from Southwestern Florida and the Gulf of Mexico
www.BillysRentals.com - Bicycle, scooter and beach rentals along with Segway tours
www.TarponBayExplorers.com - Kayaking and water activities in Ding Darling Wildlife Reserve
www.Sanibel-Carts.com - Street-Legal, Solar-Paneled Electric Cart Rentals on Sanibel & Captiva Islands!
Rates & Information
Camping
Season
$70 Per night for Camping
Off Season June 1 - Oct. 31
$65 Per night for Camping
Additional Fee Information
$7.00 Extra Person
Children under 6 Free
NOTE: Guests arriving after 8PM may park overnight in one of the slots BEFORE the gate. If all sites are full you may park on the pavement with electric hookup only. Fees Apply.
$25.00 cash deposit required upon arrival for the gate card.
Permanent Residences
$9,000 per year Park Models
$10,000 per year for Manufactured Homes
Reservations
Use the reservation form to make your reservation. NOTE: You MUST call or email to check availability BEFORE submitting a reservation!
Once you’ve confirmed your availability then send a check to:
Periwinkle Park & Campground
1119 Periwinkle Way
Sanibel Island, FL 33957
Email: periwinklepark@aol.com
SORRY NO CREDIT CARDS.
Please no international checks, we only accept U.S. Checks from U.S. Banks.
NO DOGS OR MOPEDS!
Cancellation Policy
$2.00 cancellation charge
One week cancellation notice.
Reserve Now
Get In Touch
Find us at the campground
1119 Periwinkle Way • Sanibel Island, FL 33957
Periwinkle Park & Campground
239-472-1433
periwinklepark@aol.com

Periwinkle Park Campground on Sanibel Island Now Accepting Camping Reservations for Summer and Fall 2025.
Periwinkle Park Campground, located on the Sanibel Island, is pleased to announce the availability of camping reservations for summer and fall 2024. The campground offers a unique outdoor experience for campers looking to explore the beauty of Sanibel Island.
Periwinkle Park Is Open to Campers!
